functionDecorators.name: isValid
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the recovered address from an ECDSA signature is equal to the address `signer` provided.

returnDecorators.description: valid Whether the provided address matches with the signature.

functionDecorators.name: recoverAddress
functionDecorators.description: Recovers the address for an ECDSA signature and message hash, note that the hash is automatically prefixed with "\x19Ethereum Signed Message:\n32".

returnDecorators.description: address The address that was used to sign the message.
